disclaimer.end: Please consult a certified architect or local authorities before implementation.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A minimalistic entry space with open layout, incorporating natural lighting through large windows following Vastu guidelines. The entrance aligns to the south-west for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area serving as a multifunctional space with minimal decor and neutral color palette. It includes seating arrangements and integrated storage solutions.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An ergonomic minimalist kitchen designed for efficiency with essential appliances. The design respects the Vastu principle by orienting work towards the north-east direction.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An open courtyard placed in the center to enhance natural light and ventilation. This space serves as a communal area with landscaping that adheres to Vastu.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact bathroom integrated on this level for guest convenience with essential fixtures and minimal design.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated space designed to serve as a private gym area with modular equipment layout. It is strategically placed near the courtyard for fresh air and natural light.

openings.description: A wide, accessible entrance door facing north to invite positive energy as per Vastu.
Large floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room and kitchen to enhance natural lighting while ensuring privacy.
A balcony overlooking the central courtyard for additional open space and connection with nature.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spare, minimalist bedroom designed for comfort with essential furnishings. It features a small en-suite bathroom.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A compact guest room that serves as an additional bedroom space with functional storage and minimal decor.

rooms.name: Additional Bathroom
rooms.description: A bathroom designed to serve the upper floor, incorporating water-saving fixtures and natural lighting.

openings.description: A well-designed staircase connecting ground and first floors, constructed with safety and minimalist design in mind.
Strategically placed windows for balanced natural lighting and adherence to Vastu principles, ensuring a serene atmosphere.
